snippet.title: Age of Darkness | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Test your resolve and fight for the last embers of light, when Age of Darkness: Final Stand enters early access on Steam, on September 15th.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1426450/Age_Of_Darkness_Final_Stand/
Official Website: http://www.ageofdarkness.com

Age of Darkness: Final Stand is a dark fantasy survival RTS where you must illuminate, build and defend humanity’s last bastion against hordes of Nightmares. Set in the remnants of a kingdom consumed by a deadly fog, you decide. Will you hide in the light? Or take back your world.

Join our official Discord server to chat to the developers and help shape the development of the game throughout early access: bit.ly/AoD_Discord

Interested in covering the game for your website/channel? Reach out to us at aod@playsidestudios.com

Music: Official Age of Darkness: Final Stand Soundtrack by Kamil Orman-Janowski.

#RTS #earlyaccess #AOD #medieval #fantasy #survival #roguelite
